Voyager Worldwide Careers

Whether you're an experienced professional or fresh out of college, Voyager Worldwide is a company where you can develop your expertise, use your knowledge to the fullest extent or re-invent yourself while supporting safety of life at sea worldwide.

Optional button

Job Openings at Voyager Worldwide

Job Title / Position:

Database Administrator

Department:

Information Technology

Location:

North Shields, United Kingdom

Description:

Working as an integral member of the IT team, the Database Administrator will assist the Lead DBA and ERP Manager with the planning, implementation, maintenance and performance of all business databases and ERP systems.

View details

Job Title / Position:

Database Administrator

Department:

Information Technology

Location:

North Shields, United Kingdom

Description:

Working as an integral member of the IT team, the Database Administrator will assist the Lead DBA and ERP Manager with the planning, implementation, maintenance and performance of all business databases and ERP systems.

View details

Working at Voyager Worldwide

Build the career you want

We offer competitive benefits, as well as performance-based bonuses for all employees.

Work in the company of experts

Voyager Worldwide is a global leader in the provision of maritime navigation and data analytics solutions. Collaborate with like-minded people in an environment that values individual contributions and rewards your best work. Be part of a team that encourages learning and provides the situations, projects, training and interactions that will help develop your skills.

A company you can be proud of

The companies in the Voyager Worldwide Group have been serving the world’s shipping industry for more than 2 centuries. We are defined not only by our leaders, products, technologies and service, but also by our values that ensure that we deliver the best possible service to our customers across the shipping industry worldwide.
